name: Junkyard Adventure
description:
Game was build for 16:9 resolution, full-screen recommended!

Play as a child that tries to leave the junkyard. On his way out you're gonna make a lot of friends!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

J - Jump

K - Hold to repair stunned enemies

L - Attack; Use it to stun enemies

I - Super attack; Can be used when yellow bar is full

To progress further, fix every enemy that's coming after you!

Check out rest of the team:

https://www.instagram.com/bezbrwiowiec/
